about_the_game:
* Play 18 holes, front 9, back 9 or driving range
* Solo, Local 2P, VsCPU, Online 2P PVP
* 12 unique characters
* 15 different clubs
* 2D open world golf island, explore and drive the golf cart across the entire map
* Throw grenades at the opposite player to knock them out of bounds or into water
* Zoom-able MiniMap
* hook, slice, spin & super shot.
* Sand, water, fairway, rough, green, out of bounds, path and tee areas (+ slime & smoke)
* Driving range mini-game
* Fighting platformer minigame featuring all 12 characters
* 35+ music tracks
* Full multiplayer gamepad support
* Steam remote play for 2 player multiplayer over internet
* Network support for 2 player over LAN
* Online PvP with chat and steam leaderboards
* TATE mode
* Tutorial



OGgolf is played using standard golf rules, your main focus when playing this game should be on the mini map, zoom in and out with the trigger buttons & pan with the right stick, take wind into consideration and select the right club for the remaining distance, hold the fast rotation button or rotate without holding for a more precise movement, add optional spin, then press action button for a 3 click swing. Players may have passive strengths or weaknesses or special moves activated by pressing specific buttons. Open the overhead map to find your next location and drive there in the golf cart! Full keyboard and gamepad support. Look under controls in the option menu for a complete button list.

** Check community hub for longplay videos **
** Or CLICK HERE for OGgolf longplay videos **


















1 PLAYER: Solo mode has 2 leaderboard's and can be played with the speedrun option enabled to compete in a global steam leaderboard for fastest time or disabled to compete for best score.

2 PLAYER: Local offline multiplayer played on the same computer. This mode can also be used to play over steam using the "Remote Play Together" feature. Check out for more details.

VS CPU: Compete against all 12 characters controlled by uniquely tuned computer Ai opponents! Earn trophy's for each win. Gain wins for the "offline wins" leaderoard.

LOCAL NETWORK GAME: 2 player match played over a local area network.

ONLINE: Online PVP vs other steam users. Features text chat and steam leaderboard for most wins.

DRIVING RANGE MINI GAME: Get points by hitting objects and destroying things with your golf ball, you have 3 minutes. Driving range is played in the driving range area.




"Best golf game ever" - Hex DSL

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card that supports OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might run on other 64bit versions of LINUX (untested)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS 64 bit
  • Processor: i series processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: OGgolf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32BIT
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card that supports OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 32bit and 64bit windows support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i series processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Blast your way across a full 18 hole golf course, over canyons, across small islands, on a mountain, at the beach, in a swamp and more!!!!
